title: Is there any swain nerf coming?

replies.body: If i recall he basically fell into line, his healing can be obnoxious, but just build Executioner's calling, and you will just kick him down. (Even AP champs can buy it if your never knocking him down to Morellonomicon zone of heal stopping.)
He never stops healing and even after he dies that bird thing still attacks you which is annoying =
why would they nerf him when he isn't op
